item.title: Tower of Hanoi
item.description: One of my favorite childhood game was the Tower of Hanoi which I loved playing it with my neighbor friends all the time. Also, one of my very first project in college was implementing the tower of Hanoi in C, C++, or Java. I guess this game has stuck with me for a very long time, so that today I decided to implement it again in my new favorite language - Ruby.

item.title: Completely setup Resque + Resque Schedule and Resque Mailer
item.description: When developing Rails app, there will be a chance that you will need to setup job scheduler using Resque. In this post, I’d like to share my experience setting up Resque schedule, and resque mailer on my recent Rails application My OneSight.
